QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( select distinct prov_region + ' ' + prov_division as source from {sc}.providers ), b as ( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY source DESC) AS Location_id, source from a )
SELECT distinct prov_id, b.Location_id, ('Urban_Rural:' + urban_rural + ' ' + 'Teaching:' + teaching + ' ' + 'Beds:' + cast(beds_grp as varchar(5))) as place_of_service_source_value FROM {sc}.providers Join b on prov_region + ' ' + prov_division = b.source
